import React,{createContext,useContext,useState,useEffect}from"react";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const UseContext=/*#__PURE__*/createContext();export const UseProvider=_ref=>{let{children}=_ref;const[selectedQuery,setSelectedQueryState]=useState("");const[selectedReportTitle,setSelectedReportTitleState]=useState("");const[selectedRecNo,setSelectedRecNoState]=useState("");const[selectedInitRun,setSelectedInitRunState]=useState("");// Tarayıcı yerel depolama kullanarak değerleri saklama ve algoritma
useEffect(()=>{// Tarayıcı yerel depolamadan değerleri al
const selectedQueryFromLocalStorage=localStorage.getItem("selectedQuery");const selectedReportTitleFromLocalStorage=localStorage.getItem("selectedReportTitle");const selectedRecNoFromLocalStorage=localStorage.getItem("selectedRecNo");const selectedInitRunFromLocalStorage=localStorage.getItem("selectedInitRun");// Alınan değerleri bağlamdaki durum değerlerine ata
if(selectedQueryFromLocalStorage)setSelectedQueryState(selectedQueryFromLocalStorage);if(selectedReportTitleFromLocalStorage)setSelectedReportTitleState(selectedReportTitleFromLocalStorage);if(selectedRecNoFromLocalStorage)setSelectedRecNoState(selectedRecNoFromLocalStorage);if(selectedInitRunFromLocalStorage)setSelectedInitRunState(selectedInitRunFromLocalStorage);},[]);// Boş bağımlılık dizisiyle sadece bir kez çalışmasını sağlar
// Durum değiştiğinde yerel depolamaya değerleri kaydet
useEffect(()=>{localStorage.setItem("selectedQuery",selectedQuery);localStorage.setItem("selectedReportTitle",selectedReportTitle);localStorage.setItem("selectedRecNo",selectedRecNo);localStorage.setItem("selectedInitRun",selectedInitRun);},[selectedQuery,selectedReportTitle,selectedRecNo,selectedInitRun]);// Bağlam değerlerini döndüren bir nesne
